What can I say about Portal that hasn't already been said? Portal is a fun and entertaining FPS puzzle game. You are instantly locked in this game once you start playing. The basis is to run around and shoot walls, floors, ceilings with your portal gun to get through different types of stages. While doing all this, there is a spiffy but psychotic robot voice that is training you and trying to kill you all at the same time. The robot voice is clever and funny at times which keeps the game entertaining. The game is very short but I was able to put a lot of time into it because I like to get the achievements as well. After you beat the campaign there are challenge levels that really test your skills with the portal gun. I would highly recommend anyone to play this if you're looking for a fun puzzle game.

Всем привет, недавно прошел игру PORTAL. Раньше много слышал о ней, но все руки не доходили.
Так вот, хотел сказать, что мне игра очень понравилась, особенно юмором и головоломками. Правда для меня сначало было трудно привыкнуть к самому порталу, но со временем осовоился. Вообщем, кто не играл, советую поиграть! 9/10.
Çok eğlenceli bir FPS bulmaca oyunu. Görüntü kalitesi de çok hoş sene 2017'de oyunu satın aldım en yüksek ayarlarda oynadım hiç yabancılık çekmedim.
Шедевр!
Güzel almanızı tavsiye ederim.
Das Spiel ist gut, aber ich würde euch Portal 2 empfehlen

Overview - What a wonderfully weird game this is, a fantastic unique take on a puzzle game, but with the most brilliant twist. I won't give to much away as it will take the magic away from the game, but you have a...guide if you like in the extremely funny form of a woman computer voice. She will have you in stitches with some of the things she comes out with, expecially near the end, which I will not ruin for you.

Game play- You basically aqure a gun that allows you to create portals in most walls, floors and ceilings, and you can step through one and out of another. You have to use this gun to help solve the puzzles. Good luck!



Summary - Overall I will give this game a 10/10. Perfection!  And It only cost me 60p due to a huge summer sale. :)

Portal se resume en "JUEGAZO".

Portal nos dan el mando de la protagonista llamada Chell, una sujeto de pruebas que es muda de Aperture Sciencie. 
Completaremos las pruebas que nos da GLaDOS, una computadora muy carismatica pero para resolver estas pruebas tendremos que usar un dispositivo llamado "Portal Gun" el cual es una pistola que dispara... portales... podremos crear portales para resolver los diferentes puzles.
Yo no juego los juegos por lo gráficos ya que es lo que menos me importa en un videojuego pero Portal a pesar de que fue lanzado hace casi 10 años sigue siendo un juego visialmente hermoso.
Lo malo del juego es que es muy corto, te lo pasas en una tarde, pero durante ese tiempo que lo estes jugando lo disfrutaras cada momento, habrá puzles que te pareceran imposibles pero con cuestión de tiempo y razonamiento los resolveras facilmente.

Es de mis juegos favoritos de Valve y de Steam que hasta lo e dominado a los premios de este año (2017). No digo más para no arruinar la experiencia de jugar y descubrir por uno mismo lo que ofrece el juego, es una joyita que debería estar en tú biblioteca. :)

POSITIVE REVIEWS:

- Most unique Puzzle Game of all time
- Has a story full of comedy and emotions
- No glitches
- You really need your brain to solve it all and prepare yourself for a challenge
- A very challenging game

NEGATIVE REVIEWS:

- The chapter is too small
- Doesn't have like online features or stuff
- Same puzzles all the way to the end
- The story is too short

That is what I have in my mind, thanks for making this game :)
夏促入手的，真的是太棒了，如果你注意到里面的小细节你会有种细思极恐的感觉，对于我这种喜欢看烧脑电影的人来说玩这个游戏简直就是一种享受，希望你们不要错过它
5小时把基本关卡过了，真的是晕倒不行。游戏很好哇，很有趣，但是增加距离两个传送门来回跳的时候简直要命。BOSS关把点卡好意外的简单，奖励关卡让我缓几天在玩，我再晕一会。
The Only Bad Part About Portal Is Not Playing It For The First Time Again. Love It To Bits, And I Cant Wait To Play Portal 2. Maybe Even *cough cough* 3 *cough*

A puzzle game where we can use portals to solve the puzzles. Quite fun and surprisingly not that hard, which is weird considering Valve's Half-Life is way more confusing, and that's an FPS for ya. Kinda short if you already know your way around. The Advanced Chambers present more challenge, a hardened-up version from the story chambers. Frustrating, but not really hard.
建议传送门1和2一起入，都是好游戏，不过1流程太短，不够玩。。。

В ходе игры нам предстоит взять на себя роль девушки Челл, запертой в лаборатории. Одак исусственный интеллект ГЛаДОС слишком искусственный, дабы понять что это девушка, чёрт возьми! Всю игру GLaDOS обращается к главной героине в мужском роде, что сбивает с толку. А в общем, игра хорошая, радует своими головоломками, которые иногда бывают бессмысленными и доводят до психического срыва. Особенно порадовали вполне весёлые фразочки ГЛаДОС, которые наполнены доброты, дружелюбия и искренности. 
В общем, 10 порталов из 10.
Игра супер советую!

Só posso dizer que esse foi um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Adoro jogos de puzzles e Portal conseguiu criar fases muito legais e divertidas. O único ponto negativo fica por conta do jogo ser bem curtinho.

So I got the game in the summer sale '17 in the Portal pack (both Portal games) for less than 3€.
I've basically beat the game (campaign) in 3 hours, so it's not very long and this is what I can say:

I wasn't very keen to this game at the start because its a puzzle and I'm an FP action shooter type of guy but when I started it I was blown away.
The puzzles are great, not very difficult in my opinion, the last 2 are little bit demanding and require more time to solve.
I actually had a few laughs listening to the Android (narrator) which was a nice touch and wasn't expected. The graphics are pretty good for a 2007 game and I must say I thorougly enjoyed the game. There are challenges and stuff to do after you beat the game but just wanted to write this review.

A blast! Definitely recommended to grab on sale!

Este es mi juego favorito por muchas razones, pero la más importante es que la simple idea del propio juego me tiene enamorado. Poner portales que te llevan a otro lugar para resolver puzles, en eso consiste. Dejaré que lo juegues tú mismo para que lo puedas amar tanto como yo. 
En 4 palabras: Una idea perfectamente llevada.

Ein wirklich schönes Spiel. Vor allem, da man gelegentlich echt seine grauen Zellen anstrengen muss um ein Level abzuschließen. 
Das einzige Manko das mir im Moment einfllt ist, dass der Storymodus in unter 2h durchgespielt ist. Aber das ist zu vernachlässigen, da man dank Steam-Workshop eine menge Maps spielen kann.
Le jeu en soit est simpas mais si vous l'achetez achetez le 2 qui est 500x fois mieux que celui la

I got given Portal for free and I was a bit sceptical about how good it would be. When i started playing i realised that i was compleatly wrong and this was just as good as Portal 2. The game play was a little bit harder and i had to get one of my friends to help me with the game. After that bit the game not too hard or easy.

因為PORTAL1+2現在都是打包一起賣

所以評論分數也一起

實際上因為劇情的緊密承接，所以應該視為一款遊戲來玩

遊戲中解謎成分高，遊戲性強，劇情豐富，劇情超豐富

價格超級便宜！

2代可以連線遊玩，以及支援工作坊，

讓此作除了豐富劇情以外，更大大提升遊戲性以及耐玩度。

Забавная головоломка на движке sourse.
Игру я прошёл за 3 часа и она мне не сильно понравилась.
 - Графика - убогая, старый движок sourse и ни чего не изменили, хоть я к нему и привык.
 - Геймплей - мы подбираем пушку с помощью которой будем делать порталы и проходить игру, но помтмо этогоу нас ещё откроються испытания которые можно проходить.
 - Сюжет - Мы как единственный выживший человек, должны проходить испытания. И все припятствия нам делает робот по тмени ГЛаДОС, ну как-то так. Но потом нашему ГГ надоест шататься по этим испытаниям и она будет делать бунт.
ВЫВОД: Лабороторная крыса, которая молча проходит испытания.
Игра не впечатлила.

[h1]Unexpectedly and utterly hilarious[/h1]
Portal is a Sci-Fi first person puzzle solving title made by Valve.
Originally designed as a quick stocking filler, it turned cult status after release. 
This game is as loved as Half-Life is, for good reason. 
[i]The dark humor in this game is just the bees knees.[/i]
[b]It is as enjoyable and amusing in 2019 as it was in 2007.[/b]
[b]Grab this and Portal 2 in a bundle when on sale, 90% off constantly.[/b]

Ademas cuebta con uno de los mejores personajes que pude encontrar, GlaDos, con una carisma que sin duda hacen lo mejor del juego

No obstante el juego es muy corto y te deja con ganas de más.
